name: Xibalba
description: '''Xibalba''' is an American [[hardcore punk]] band from [[Pomona, California]], formed in 2007. The band plays hardcore with influences from [[death metal]] and [[doom metal]], with lyrics in English and Spanish. Their debut album, ''[[Madre Mia Gracias Por Los Dias]]'' (2010) was released through A389 Recordings.  Their second album, ''Hasta La Muerte'' (2012), was released by [[Southern Lord Records|Southern Lord]].
